Articles.Content:
Hi everyone! I'm Hobbes Novakoff! I've been a lurker on the forums for a few months, and I started playing KSP around last March (I remember I started right around when 23.5 came out), so I am most definitely not a newb (bit of a noob though)

About me:

I tend to take the side with the best reasoning in an argument and stick with that side unless someone gives me relatively logical evidence to the contrary, so if I'm wildly defending something totally stupid, tell me why it's stupid and I'll stop.

Design philosophy:

Simplicity (my laptop is about the size of a serving platter and has maybe twice as much processing power)

Aethestics (for reasons)

Function
Welcome to the forums! Glad to have you aboard
